name: SwapSlots
description: Swap two deployment slots of an Azure Web App
author: Geek Learning
instanceNameFormat: Swap Azure Web App slots: $(SourceSlot) to $(DestinationSlot)

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to target for swapping Web App deployment slots

inputs.name: WebAppName
inputs.label: Web App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing AzureRM Web Application

inputs.name: DestinationUrl
inputs.label: Destination Slot Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name for the variable for the destination slot url. The variable can be used as $(variableName) to refer to the hosted url of webapp in subsequent tasks like in the PowerShell on Target Machines task.

messages.WebappslotsuccessfullyswappedatUrl0: Web App slot successfully swapped at Url : {0}
messages.Unabletoretrievewebapppublishurlforwebap: Unable to retrieve Web App slot url for webapp : '{0}'.
